00143             function                get_default_category_structure_templates( $Options , $Templates = array() )
00144             {
00145                   try
00146                   {
00147                         $DisplayTemplates = array();
00148                         
00149                         $Item = $Options->get_setting( 'start_tag_template' , 'start_tag_template.tpl' );
00150                         $DisplayTemplates[ 'start_tag' ] = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $Item );
00151                         
00152                         $Item = $Options->get_setting( 'end_tag_template' , 'end_tag_template.tpl' );
00153                         $DisplayTemplates[ 'end_tag' ] = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $Item );
00154                         
00155                         $Item = $Options->get_setting( 'start_item_tag_template' , 'start_item_tag_template.tpl' );
00156                         $DisplayTemplates[ 'start_item_tag' ] = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $Item );
00157                         
00158                         $Item = $Options->get_setting( 'start_leaf_tag_template' , 'start_leaf_tag_template.tpl' );
00159                         $DisplayTemplates[ 'start_leaf_tag' ] = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $Item );
00160                         
00161                         $Item = $Options->get_setting( 'end_item_tag_template' , 'end_item_tag_template.tpl' );
00162                         $DisplayTemplates[ 'end_item_tag' ] = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $Item );
00163                         
00164                         extend( $DisplayTemplates , $Templates );
00165                         
00166                         return( $DisplayTemplates );
00167                   }
00168                   catch( Exception $e )
00169                   {
00170                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00171                   }
00172             }

00196             function                get_categories_catalogue_templates( $Templates = false )
00197             {
00198                   try
00199                   {
00200                         $DisplayTemplates = array(
00201                               'start_tag' => '<div class="catalogue_branch_class">' , 
00202                               'end_tag' => '</div>' , 
00203                               'start_item_tag' => '<div>'.
00204                                           '<span class="catalogue_item"><a href="./catalogue.html?cid={id}">{title}</a></span>'.
00205                                           '<div class="catalogue_subitems">' , 
00206                               'end_item_tag' => '</div></div>'
00207                         );
00208                         
00209                         if( $Templates !== false )
00210                         {
00211                               extend( $DisplayTemplates , $Templates );
00212                         }
00213                         
00214                         return( $DisplayTemplates );
00215                   }
00216                   catch( Exception $e )
00217                   {
00218                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00219                   }
